title: Tepe Abdul Hosein
description: Settlement site near Abdul Hosein village in Luristan, Iran dated to the Neolithic period. The site was occupied by non-sedentary people who left behind no structures besides a wall.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Tepe Abdul Hosein after Pullar 1990.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Tepe Abdul Hosein
